sense.name: enliven or motivate; serve as the inciting cause
sense.examples: Our goal is to create organizations that inspire the soul. U.S. presidents should inspire the world. Small business leaders inspire the highest confidence. The article about the artist inspired the recent exhibition of his work. She inspired me to write my own book. His early work was clearly inspired by the Impressionists.

sense.name: inhale
sense.examples: He must have inspired the fibers into his lungs. The patient has trouble inspiring.
